overview: FlySpy is a short-thriller about a young, genius deviant called Greg, who has made a wirelessly controlled drone in the form of a fly with a camera in its head.  Everything the fly can see Greg can see. He is deeply obsessed with his ex-girlfriend Haley so he spends his time secretly watching her through the eyes of his tiny robotic partner in crime. But when Greg witnesses Haleyâ€™s violent new boyfriend, John, abusing her, it very quickly becomes clear that for Greg, simply watching, is not enough.
title: Flyspy
